verses.1: Tua ciangin Topa in Noah kiangah, “Nang le na innkuan pih mi khempeuh teembaw sungah pai un. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih khang mite sung panin nang bek a thuman na hihna ka hong thei hi.
verses.2: Ganhing siangtho nupa kop sagih, ganhing a siang lo nupa kop khat,
verses.3: huihlak vasate zong nupa kop sagih, leitungah amauʼ nam a manthan loh nadingin la in.
verses.4: Bang hang hiam cih leh tuzawh ni sagih sungin sun sawm li le zan sawm li sung leitungah guah ka zusak ding hi. Ka bawl sa nuntakna a nei peuhmah leitung panin ka phiat khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.5: Noah in zong Topaʼ thupiak khempeuh a hih hi.
verses.6: Leitungah tuiciin a tun lai-in Noah kum za guk pha hi.
verses.7: Tuiciin a pelh dingin Noah, a tapate, a zi le a tapateʼ zite teembaw sungah pai uh hi.
verses.8: Ganhing siangthote, a siang lo ganhingte, vasate, leitung a a bokvak peuhmah,
verses.9: a nupa kopin Pasian in Noah a thupiak sa bangin teembaw sungah Noah tawh pai uh hi.
verses.10: A ni sagih ni-in leitungah tuiciin tung hi.
verses.11: Noahʼ nuntak kum za guk kum, a kha nihna, tua kha ni sawm le sagih ni-in van a om a thuk mahmah tuikhukte puakkhamin, vantung tawlette kihong hi.
verses.12: Sun sawm li le zan sawm li sung leitungah guah zu hi.
verses.13: Tua ni teekteekin Noah le a tapate Shem, Ham, Jafeth le Noahʼ zi le a tapateʼ zi thumte, amau tawh teembaw sungah a tum uh hi.
verses.14: Amaute le gamsa peuhmah amauʼ nam ciat, innsa khempeuh amauʼ nam ciat, leitungah a bokvak peuhmah amauʼ nam ciat le vasa peuhmah amauʼ nam ciat, vasa namkim amauʼ nam ciatin a tum uh hi.
verses.15: Nuntak husanna a nei khempeuh a nupa kop ciatin Noah tawh teembaw sungah a pai uh hi.
verses.16: Pasian in Noah tungah a thupiakna bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh teembaw sungah a lut khit ciangin Topa in Noah kong a khaknelh hi.
verses.17: Leitungah tuiciin ni sawm li sung om den hi. Tui tam semsem a, teembaw laam to-in, leitungʼ tungah khangin sang to lai hi.
verses.18: Tui khang to-in leitungah tam mahmah hi. Tui tungah teembaw laam hi.
verses.19: Leitungah tui khangkhang ahih manin mual sangte khempeuh tuumcip hi.
verses.20: Mual liante tungah tui om to lai a, tuate tungah pi sawm nih le nih thuk-in tuumcip hi.
verses.21: Leitungah a nungta khempeuh, vasate, innsate, gamsate, a honhonin leitungah a hon om ganhing khempeuh le mi khempeuh a si uh hi.
verses.22: Leitungah a om, nuntakna hu a nei peuhmah a si uh hi.
verses.23: Mihing, ganhing, a bok vakte le huihlak vasate, leitung a om nuntakna a nei peuhmah amah in phiat khia hi. Leitung panin amaute kiphiat khia hi. Noah le amah tawh teembaw sunga a om teng bek a suakta uh hi.
verses.24: Ni za le ni sawm nga sung leitungah tui om hi.
